Neither the name of the University nor the names of its contributors 51 * may be used to endorse or promote products derived from this software 52 * without specific prior written permission. 53 * 54 * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE REGENTS AND CONTRIBUTORS ``AS IS'' AND 55 * ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE 56 * IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE 61 * HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT 62 * LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY 63 * OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF 64 * SUCH DAMAGE. 65 * 66 * @(#)kernel.h 8.3 (Berkeley) 1/21/94 67 */ 68#ifndef _SYS_KERNEL_H_ 69#define _SYS_KERNEL_H_ 70 71#include <sys/appleapiopts.h> 72 73#ifdef KERNEL 74 75#include <sys/param.h> 76 77#ifdef BSD_KERNEL_PRIVATE 78#include <stdbool.h> 79#include <kern/locks.h> 80 81/* Global variables for the kernel. */ 82 83/* 1.1 */ 84extern long hostid; 85extern char hostname[MAXHOSTNAMELEN]; 86extern lck_mtx_t hostname_lock; 87extern char domainname[MAXHOSTNAMELEN]; 88extern lck_mtx_t domainname_lock; 89 90/* 1.2 */ 91extern int stathz; /* statistics clock's frequency */ 92extern int profhz; /* profiling clock's frequency */ 93#endif /* BSD_KERNEL_PRIVATE */ 94 95 96#ifdef KERNEL_PRIVATE 97extern struct timezone tz; /* XXX */ 98 99extern int tick; /* usec per tick (1000000 / hz) */ 100extern int hz; /* system clock's frequency */ 101 102#endif /* KERNEL_PRIVATE */ 103 104#endif /* KERNEL */ 105 106#endif /* !_SYS_KERNEL_H_ */
